title: No one can believe the bloody scene in Downton Abbey
text:
No one can believe the bloody scene in Downton Abbey No one can believe the bloody scene in Downton Abbey 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The dinner table at the Grantham house turned into a bloodbath as Lord Granthamâ€™s ulcer burst and he appeared to explode. 
Absolutely no one was ready for it. [SPOILER!] someone call for an ambulance I think I'm having a heart attack. #downtonabbey #SpoilerAlert pic.twitter.com/Wdg9iCJaWR

â€” Beth Durant (@bethmaidurant) October 18, 2015 Good old downton .. 'I have a bit of indigestion'â€¦ 2 minutes later aggressively vomits blood all over the place.. #DowntonAbbey 
â€” Charlie Beeching (@CharlieBeeching) October 18, 2015 
Seriously! It was like something out of Alien. Just seen the most disturbing scene ever. DOWNTON WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO ME ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ #DowntonAbbey

â€” Antonella Cortese (@la_Cortese) October 18, 2015 #DowntonAbbey Blimey! That really was a 'scene of a shocking nature'!!! 
â€” Sally Claydon (@SallyClaydon) October 18, 2015 Well that's what @ITV meant when they said 'shocking scenes'!! #DowntonAbbey

But they canâ€™t kill off Lord Gratham surely. Can they? CAN THEY? #DowntonAbbey How can Lord Grantham survive this in 1925? 
â€” Simon McVicker (@SimonMcVicker) October 18, 2015 I swear to god, if something happens to Robert, I will hit the roof #DowntonAbbey

None of the cast seemed to be as alarmed as the rest of us. Knocked the stuffing out of him?! Christ it knocked half his guts out Mary love! ðŸ˜¨ #DowntonAbbey #DowntonDoesAlien

Thankfully it seems he has a good chance of recovery, but weâ€™re still shocked to the core. Well I am officially freaked out. #DowntonAbbey Share article
